basics.name: Péter Józan
basics.label: Software engineer - Industrial automation from #PLC to #MES and beyond
basics.summary: I have 10+ years engineering experience in various industrial sectors: FMCG, Automotive and Paper. I have a huge passion for solving issues in complex enviroment. I always want to see the whole picture and understand relations/logical connections. I love to learn and gain useful knowledge and I am motivated by developing and improving valuable solutions which makes life easier.

work.name: Musashi Hungary Manufacturing Ltd.
work.summary:
Key person specialized in automation: creating the automation concept, designing interfaces between machines, cooperation with suppliers. Develop PLC and robot programs for production cell based on ISA-TR:88 standard package as a leading engineer.

As well I support startup and serial operation with my knowledge: troubleshooting machine faults and breakdowns or even manufacturing issues. My main focus area is capability building: share my knowledge with other engineers/experts and train operators, technicians.

work.name: Musashi Hungary Manufacturing Ltd.
work.summary:
Planning periodic maintenance on CNC lathing/grinding machines and machining centres, robots and post process measuring machines. Troubleshooting machine failures and participate in mind-storming in order to solve technological issues.
Support line startups and establish new functionalities: integrate additional equipment in order to eliminate scrap parts production, programming technology specific M-codes for cycle time reduction, fine tuning Fanuc robot programs.

work.name: Procter & Gamble
work.summary: Leader of a 21-member team, responsible for production in terms of safety, quality and every KPI of the manufacturing process (MPSP, Scrap, MU, RCO, Budget).

work.name: Procter & Gamble
work.summary:
Leading loss eliminating projects achieving 115 000 USD annual savings. For example a 90% scrap reduction
by finding the appropriate technological parameters and maintain results via the proper system.

work.name: LCM Stanc Kft.
work.summary:
Deploying maintenance system to the complete tool manufacturing works: eliminating unplanned stops
besides decreasing maintenance costs. Decreasing water cutting machine annual maintenance cost by 65% 
due to performing tasks internally.

work.name: Coca-Cola Hellenic Bottling Company
work.summary:
Diagnostic analysis on drive elements: achieving 0 hours unplanned stop based on reliable predictions of
failures. I have prepared a training material of the measurements with a measuring calendar and a map.
